Lecturer is too much interested in describing the past technologies. Spend too much time on describing about IOS and Android features from Version 1.

The course information is out of date. The data is from 2017, we are currently in 2021. In the telecommunications sector, a sector of constant and rapid change, it is important that the information is as up to date as possible and I think that 4 years difference is remarkable.

Agradezco en principio el permitrirme realizar esta especialización en el maravilloso mundo de las Tecnologias Emergentes o Revolución Industrialm 4.0. . Iniciado en momentos mas dificiles de la Sociedad, por el tema pandemia COVID.  En realidad fue una experiencia formativa muy extensa por la cantidad de información estudiada, se requirio mucho, tiempo y dediación. Espero pronto recibir el Certificado de dicha Especialización, lo cual seguro mem abrira nuevos horizontes en el mundo de la tecnologia. Gracias.

I​ found this course really enjoyable and helpful. Tbh I was skeptical at first as I'm not someone who's into mobile architecture and network but I have a coursework related to this topic and so decided to take up this course.A​nd turns out it's quite interesting, I enjoyed learning the mechanism of how wireless technologies work, the diagramtic representations are very helpful to visualize the same.I​ can now understand more about the OS and operations of our mobile phones in a better way too.O​verall, I'm thankful for Prof. Jong Moon Chung, Yonsei Uni and Coursera for this course.
